channel.title: Wildy help!

item.title: Wildy help!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

hello! ive been asking for 3 days now and i REALLY need help!

ok so in my server you can attack people anywhere and i want to make it so you can only attack in the wild, i dont have nonwild or safezone, but i do have this:

public boolean Wild() {
if((absX <= 3249) ||
(absX >= 3258) ||
(absY <= 3415) ||
(absY >= 3424))
return true;
else
return false;
}

PLEASE HELP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2008, 08:23:27 AM[/size][hr]OMG COME ON! someone here should be able to help me ive been asking for 3 days! and no one helpedâ€¦
